title: New: Baths – Miasma Sky
content:
Baths, it’s been too long.

Having released his debut album Cerulean to critical acclaim back in 2010, he’s since garnered a loyal following and played shows all across the world. Now, with the world at his fingers tips he’s unveiled the first cut from his sophomore record, Obsidian (Anticon, 28 May 2013). A bolder effort than we’re used to from the multi-talented musician, Miasma Sky is everything we’ve come to love about Baths, merging classical influences with unrivalled production mastery.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
